member.name: T:DnDHelper.Dice
member.summary: This is a utility class used to generate a random number from the roll of a die.

member.name: M:DnDHelper.Dice.Roll(System.Byte)
member.summary: This method takes as input the number of sides on a die and returns a random number between 1 and the number of sides.
member.param: The number of sides on the die.
member.returns: Returns a random number between 1 and numberSides.
member.exception: Throws this exception if the numberSides passed in is less than or equal to 0.
